alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing a nickel atom.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic nickel compounds

class.description: Inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.
class.name: Intermetallic post-transition metal compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as intermetallic post-transition metal compounds. These are inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds containing only metal atoms of at least two different types, where the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Intermetallic post-transition metal compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

superclass.description: Inorganic compounds that contain only metal atoms.
superclass.name: Homogeneous metal compounds
